18177113.admreg: Middle East and North Africa,Middle East and North Africa

abstracts.cdata!:
The First Water Supply Project comprises
            expansion and improvement of the main water supply and
            distribution systems in Tunisia, and improvement of the
            Borrower's organization and operations.
